translation.en: And in their triumph die, like fire and powder.
Gran, I'd like you to meet--
I thought we agreed no presents.
Well, the one from me's not wrapped. So it doesn't count.
translation.ko: 포장을 안 해서 선물 축에도 못 껴

translation.en: Uh, it goes with this one from your mom.
translation.ko: 이건 엄마 선물인데 서로 맞춰서 샀어

translation.en: We coordinated. Well, she coordinated me.
translation.ko: 이건 엄마 선물인데 서로 맞춰서 샀어 엄마가 그러쟀지

translation.en: It's to, uh, put your pictures in from senior year.
How'd you get so old so fast?

translation.ko: 저 그렇게 안 늙었어요 근데 흰머리가 나?

translation.en: [man on radio] Another missing hiker brings the total to three presumed dead.
translation.ko: 또 등산객이 실종돼 총 3명이 사망한 것으로 보이며

translation.en: Rangers are searching for the killer animal--
translation.ko: 경비대가 이 살인 동물을 추적 중…

translation.en: Uh, R and J essay due?
Let me take a picture of you guys.
My mom wants me to put together, like, a big scrapbook full of memories.
translation.ko: 사진 좀 찍자, 엄마가 앨범에 추억을 채우래

translation.en: -Oh, cool, yeah. -I take 'em, I'm not in 'em, so…
You'll Photoshop this if my nose looks big, right?
translation.ko: 나 코 커 보이면 보정해 줘

translation.en: [Eric] Don't worry, I'm in the picture. No one will be looking at you guys.
translation.ko: 다들 나만 볼 테니 걱정들 마

translation.en: Bell, your birth is definitely something to celebrate.
Yeah, but my aging is not.
I think 18 is a little young to start worrying about that.
-It's one year older than you. -No, it isn't.
[Bella] Wow. Maybe I shouldn't be dating such an old man.
-Mmm. -It's gross. -[Bella] I should be thoroughly repulsed. -Mmm.
We have to go to class. Okay.
[Bella] Hello, biceps. You know, anabolic steroids are really bad for you.
translation.ko: 야, 근육맨! 근육약 너무 먹으면 안 좋아

translation.en: [Jacob chuckles] Well, I'm just filling out, Bella.
You know, it wouldn't seem so drastic if we hung out more.
You should switch schools. You can come hang out with the palefaces.
I'm all right. I prefer the rez school's exclusivity.
translation.ko: 됐어, 우리 학교가 더 깐깐해서 좋아

translation.en: They let any old riff-raff into this place.
I see. Then why are you slummin' it?
I was just buying a part for the Rabbit.
You should really come take a ride when it's done.
[Jacob] Your dad told my dad, so…
I saw this the other day and thought of you.
-Good seeing you. -Yeah, I'll see you later.
So how come Jacob Black gets to give you a gift and I don't?
translation.ko: 제이콥은 선물 줘도 되고 난 안 돼?

translation.en: 'Cause I have nothing to give back to you.
Bella, you give me everything just by breathing.
[scoffs] I thought I said no presents.
I've already seen you open it, and guess what?
You're gonna wear it tonight. Our place.
Come on, please? [Alice] It'll be fun.
[giggles] Great! Okay, I'll see you at seven.
Jasper. No fair with the mood control thing.
translation.ko: 재스퍼, 남의 기분 조종하는 게 어딨어?
뱀파이어는 믿을 게 못 돼 내 말 믿어

translation.en: [man on TV] O, my love. My wife!
Death, that hath sucked the honey of thy breath,
but hath no power yet upon thy beauty.

translation.ko: 죽음의 그림자도 그걸 빼앗진 못했구려 축하받는 거 싫어

translation.en: [Edward] There are worse tragedies. Look at Romeo.
Killed his true love out of sheer stupidity.
But I do envy him one thing.
If you like that obviously beautiful sort of thing.
Not the girl, the, uh… the suicide.
'Cause I had to consider it once.
[Edward] I didn't know if I'd get to you in time.
I had to come up with some kind of… plan.
Go to Italy and provoke the Volturi.
[teacher] Now, who'd like to repeat the last few lines of iambic pentameter
just to show they were paying attention?
translation.ko: 마지막 몇 구절 외워 볼 사람?

translation.en: "O here, will I set up my everlasting rest…
…and shake the yoke of inauspicious stars from this world-wearied flesh.
And lips, O you, the doors of breath,
seal with a righteous kiss a dateless bargain to engrossing death."
translation.ko: '정당한 키스로 도장을 찍어 죽음과 영원한 계약을 맺어라'

translation.en: [man on TV] Thus with a kiss, I die.
[Edward] The Volturi are a very old, very powerful family.
I guess they're the closest thing to royalty my world has.
translation.ko: 우리 세계의 왕족에 가장 가깝다고 할 수 있지

translation.en: He lived with them for a few decades.
Described them as very refined. No respect for human life, of course,
translation.ko: 아주 고상하대 인간 생명은 하찮게 봐도

translation.en: but respect for the arts and the sciences, at least.
And only one that's regularly enforced.
[Edward] That we keep the existence of our kind a secret.
We don't make spectacles of ourselves.
Unless, of course, you want to die.
You gotta stop talking about that.
I can't even think… about someone hurting you.
Bella. The only thing that can hurt me is you.
translation.ko: 벨라, 날 해칠 수 있는 건 너뿐이야

translation.en: And I don't have anything else to be afraid of.
Victoria. She'll come for me one day.
Alice will see when she decides, and…
Bella. You already do protect me.
translation.ko: 벨라, 넌 이미 날 지켜주고 있어

translation.en: to stay alive, if that's what I am.
But it's my job to protect you.
[Alice] It's time. It's time, it's time, it's time.
Sorry about all this. We tried to rein Alice in.
translation.ko: 미안하게 됐다 - 앨리스를 말렸지만… - 말을 들어야지

translation.en: As if that were even possible. Happy birthday, Bella.
translation.ko: - 앨리스를 말렸지만… - 말을 들어야지 - 생일 축하한다 - 고맙습니다

translation.en: I… found it in your bag. Mind?
It's a necklace. Alice picked it out.
Already installed it in your truck.
Finally a decent sound system for that piece of--
Hey, don't… don't hate the truck.
translation.ko: - 똥차랑 좀… - 내 차 욕하지 마

translation.en: [Carlisle] Just a little something to brighten your day.
Yes, you've been looking kind of pale lately.
It's okay. It's just a little…
I'll have to stitch this up in my office.
[Carlisle] I'm sure he's very upset with himself,
and I doubt he'll listen to anyone but you right now.
translation.ko: 너 말고는 누구 얘기도 안 들을 거야

translation.en: [Bella] I never wanted to have a party.
Jasper hasn't been away from human blood as long as the rest of us.
translation.ko: 재스퍼는 인간의 피를 멀리한 지 얼마 안 됐어

translation.en: [Bella] Did you ever think of… just doing it the easy way?
translation.ko: 쉽게 사실 생각은… 안 해 보셨어요?

translation.en: -I knew who I wanted to be. -[tool clinks] I wanted to help people.
-Brings me happiness. -[snips] -Even if I am damned, regardless. -[scissors clink]
You've always been very… gracious about us.
So that's it. That's why he won't change me?
Imagine the situation in reverse, hmm?
If you believed as Edward does,
could you take away his soul?
At some point, something's gonna separate us.
translation.ko: 언젠가는 무언가 우리를 갈라 놓을 거야

translation.en: It's gonna be an accident or illness,
And the only solution is to change me.
translation.ko: 그러니 날 변화시키는 게 유일한 해결책이야

translation.en: That's not a solution, that's a tragedy.
translation.ko: 그건 해결이 못 돼 비극만 부를 뿐

translation.en: You're not gonna want me when I look like a grandmother.
translation.ko: 내가 할머니 되면 쳐다도 안 볼걸

translation.en: Bella, do you not understand my feelings for you at all?
translation.ko: 벨라 너에 대한 내 마음을 전혀 이해 못 하겠어?

translation.en: How you feel about your soul.
So can I ask one thing?
Come and take a walk with me.
Carlisle is supposed to be ten years older than he looks,
and people are starting to notice.
I've got to think of something to say to Charlie.
I mean my family and myself.
Edward, what happened with Jasper… It's nothing.
Nothing but what I always expected.
And nothing compared to what could have happened.
translation.ko: 더 큰 사고에 비해 별건 아니지

translation.en: You just don't belong in my world, Bella.
I don't want you to come.
translation.ko: 난 네가 오는 거 바라지 않아

translation.en: That changes things. A lot. [exhales deeply]
But if it's not too much to ask,
can you just promise me something?
And I'll promise something to you in return.
This is the last time you'll ever see me.
And you can go on with your life without any interference from me.
translation.ko: 내가 네 인생에 걸림돌 되는 일은 없을 거야

translation.en: It'll be like… I never existed, I promise.
If this is about my soul, take it. I don't want it without you.
translation.ko: 내 영혼 때문이면 가져가 너 없인 영혼도 필요 없어

translation.en: You're just not good for me.
Not good enough for you. [breathes shakily]
I'm just sorry I let this go on for so long.
I'm going to try the Cullens' place again.
The Cullens left town, Charlie. Good riddance.
translation.ko: - 그 사람들 떠났네 - 앓던 이가 빠졌군

translation.en: Who else can I talk to? I'm lost.
When you left… ♪ There's a possibility ♪
But the absence of him is everywhere I look.
It's like a huge hole has been punched through my chest.
translation.ko: 가슴에 커다란 구멍이 뚫린 것만 같아

translation.en: [Bella] But in a way, I'm glad.
The pain is my only reminder that he was real.
translation.ko: 이 고통은 그가 있었다는 유일한 증거니까

translation.en: You're going to Jacksonville. Live with your mother.
It's just not normal, this behavior.
[Charlie] Quite frankly, it's scaring the hell out of me and your mother.
Baby, I… I don't want you to leave.
I don't, but just go. Go to Jacksonville.
translation.ko: 싫지만 가, 가서 친구도 새로 사귀고

translation.en: -Make some new friends. -I like my old friends.
translation.ko: 싫지만 가, 가서 친구도 새로 사귀고 지금 친구가 좋아요

translation.en: …gonna, uh, go shopping tomorrow with Jessica.
I like it. Go. Buy some stuff.
[Jessica] I don't know why you want to sit through
translation.ko: "망자의 귀환" 하필 사람 잡아먹는 좀비 영화라니

translation.en: all those zombies eating people and no hot guys kissing anybody.
translation.ko: 하필 사람 잡아먹는 좀비 영화라니 섹시한 남자랑 로맨스도 없고

translation.en: It's gross, like… Why are there that many zombie movies anyway?
translation.ko: 끔찍하게 좀비 영화는 왜 그리 많아?

translation.en: If it's supposed to, like, draw a parallel about leprosy,
my cousin had leprosy. It's not funny, you know.
translation.ko: 내 사촌이 그 병이라 기분 나빠

translation.en: And, like, is it supposed to be a metaphor for consumerism,
'cause don't be so pleased with your own, like,
Like, some girls like to shop. Not all girls, apparently.
Though I was surprised you even called at all, you know?
Like, your depression thing, I get it. I'm totally, totally worried.
But after a while, it's like, -you're still bumming? -[man] Want a ride, girls?
translation.ko: - 시간이 지나도 늘어져 있고 - 너희들 탈래?

translation.en: And I'm going through stuff too.

translation.ko: - 잘들 지내? - 우리가 찾은 걸 봐

translation.en: -[man] Come here for a sec. -[Jessica scoffs]
I think I know those guys.
[man] We got beer. We got bikes.
Well, they seem great. Can we go?
All right, all right, we got a taker.
-Turn around. -♪ All my life I've been searching♪
♪ But every Friday just about midnight ♪
I'm sorry, I thought you were somebody else.
No, that's cool. I'll be whoever you want me to be, honey.
You promised it would be as if you never existed.
Did you say something, babe? You know what, never mind.
[Jessica] Hey, um, what the hell's wrong with you?
I thought that I saw something.
That homeboy could have been a psycho.
I was about to end up in an FBI interview room like some lame TV show.
God, that was such a rush.
Awesome, so you're an adrenaline junkie now?
That's cool, you can go bungee jumping.
You don't get on the back of some random loser's motorcycle.
Maybe I'm crazy now. I guess that's okay.
If a rush of danger is what it takes to see him,
translation.ko: 극도로 위험한 순간 그를 볼 수만 있다면

translation.en: Where the hell have you been, loca?

translation.ko: 이런 고철 덩어리네 뭘 이런 걸 다

translation.en: -You shouldn't have. -I saved it from the junkyard.
translation.ko: 고철 덩어리네 뭘 이런 걸 다 고물상에서 건졌어

translation.en: I think they'll probably cost more to fix than they're worth.
But then I thought that if I had a mechanic friend
- to help me out, then… - Ah, me.
Since when are you into motorcycles?
I get it if you think that this is really stupid and reckless.
Yeah, I mean it's completely stupid and reckless.
Those things are actually really heavy, so…
Jake, you're, like, buff. How did that happen?
translation.ko: 제이콥, 너 천하장사 같아 16살짜리가 좀 과한데?

translation.en: You're, like, 16. I don't get it.
[chuckles] Age is just a number, baby. What are you, like, 40 now?
-♪ I may never ever find a cure ♪ -Feels like that sometimes.
That song's good. You don't like it?
Um, I don't really like… …music anymore, kind of.
translation.ko: 나 이제… 음악 같은 거 별로야
알았어 그럼 음악 없이 하지, 뭐

translation.en: So, I was thinking, if we're going to do this every day,
we have to, like, fit some homework in there somewhere.
I don't want Billy thinking that I'm a bad influence on you.
translation.ko: 너 망친다고 아저씨한테 한 소리 들을라

translation.en: Are you… I'm older than you, so…
…that makes me the influencer, and you the influencee.
My size and knowledge base actually makes me older than you,
because of your general paleness and lack of know-how.
I convinced you to build two-wheeled death machines with me.
translation.ko: 살인 기계 만들자는 꼬드김에 넘어간 건

translation.en: Don't you think that makes you kind of young and naive?
Okay, so where do we stand?
I'm 35. -And you might be, like, 32. -[knock at door]
No, it's ok, it's just my boys.
Oh, yeah, yeah. I taught him everything he knows.
What about the part where you're his girlfriend?
Actually, remember I said she's a girl and a friend.
translation.ko: - 너 깬다! - 그게… 여자 사람 친구랬잖아

translation.en: Embry, do you remember him making that distinction?
translation.ko: 엠브리, 쟤가 그런 구별한 적 있냐?

translation.en: So you guys have girlfriends. That's awesome.
Yeah, right. Quil's actually taking his cousin to prom.
translation.ko: 그래서 퀼은 댄스파티에 사촌 애 데려갔단다

translation.en: You want funny, Black? I'll give you funny.
[Embry] I got five bucks on Quil.
[Bella] Dear Alice, I wish I had your real address.
I wish I could tell you about Jake.
I mean, he makes me feel alive.
Well, when I'm with Jake, it's… …it's like it's almost healed.
translation.ko: 그 애와 있을 땐 메워지는 기분이야

translation.en: [Jacob] So, Quil keeps asking to come over.
I think he likes you a little too much.
Well, I'm really not into the whole cougar thing, you know?
What's up with you and age?
I mean, how old was that Cullen guy anyway?
[Bella] But even Jake can't keep the dreams away.
-[door opens] -Hey, hey, hey. Hey, hey, hey.

translation.ko: 일어나 봐, 쉿! 괜찮아, 이제 괜찮아

translation.en: Well, I thought this thing was starting to work, but… I guess not.
That seems to take your mind off things a bit, doesn't it?
translation.ko: 힘든 게 좀 덜해지는 거 같던데

translation.en: …you gotta learn to love what's good for you.
translation.ko: 너한테 이로운 사랑을 택할 줄도 알아야 해

translation.en: Of course, what do I know?
If I told you I couldn't have fixed these bikes, what would you have said?
translation.ko: 내가 못 고친다고 하면 어쩌려고 했어?

translation.en: Are you doubting your mad skills?
No. Definitely not. I mean, they'll run fine.
translation.ko: 아니, 그건 아니지 잘 나갈 거야

translation.en: Maybe if I was smart, I would have dragged out the rebuild a bit.
If you told me you couldn't fix these bikes,
translation.ko: 네가 못 고친 댔으면 그냥 좀…

translation.en: I would say that that's really too bad,
translation.ko: 네가 못 고친 댔으면 그냥 좀… 실망은 해도

translation.en: but that we're just gonna have to find something else to do.
translation.ko: 실망은 해도 같이 딴 거 하자고 했을 거야

translation.en: They're not really fighting, Bella. They're cliff diving.
translation.ko: 싸우는 거 아냐 절벽 다이빙 하는 거지

translation.en: Scary as hell, but a total rush.
A rush? [Jacob] Most of us jump from lower down.
translation.ko: - 짜릿? - 보통은 좀 낮은 데서 뛰어

translation.en: We leave the showing off to Sam and his disciples.
translation.ko: 샘과 그 사도들이나 자기 과시에 목매지

translation.en: You have some kind of beef with him or something?
[Jacob] They just think they run this place.
Embry used to call them hall monitors on steroids.
Now, all of a sudden, he started following Sam around like a little puppy.
translation.ko: 이젠 강아지처럼 졸졸 샘만 따라 다녀

translation.en: Same thing happened with Paul and Jared.
Sam keeps giving me this look.
Like he's waiting for me or something.
It's kind of starting to freak me out.
Well, you should just avoid him.
-I want to go again. -Are you trying to get yourself killed?
-I want to go again. -No, forget it.
Well, it's just blood, Bella. No big deal.
translation.ko: 그냥 피 좀 난 거 갖고 뭘 그래

translation.en: How hard did you hit your head?
[Angela] I did see something in the woods.
No, he doesn't. He's just trying to get lucky.
[Angela] No. It was jet black and huge.
On all fours, it was still taller than a person.
Or an alien. You're lucky you didn't get probed. -[Eric laughs] -Oh, yeah.
[Bella] You know you're not the only one.
Um, my dad's been getting reports at the station.
Like, five hikers have been killed by some bear,
but they can't find the bear.
Last time you clowns doubt my girlfriend.
translation.ko: 내 여자 친구 또 의심했단 봐라

translation.en: Um, so listen, you know, now that, you know, you're talking and, uh…
eating again, which, you know, gotta get that protein in there.
translation.ko: 먹기도 하니까… 몸 생각 해서 잘 챙겨 먹어

translation.en: I was just wondering if you wanted to go see a movie with me.
Cool, um… Let me see, we could check out, um…
[clicks tongue] Love Spelled Backwards Is Love.
You know, it's a dumb title, but, um, it's a romantic comedy.
-I mean, it's supposed to be… -No. No romance.
How about Face Punch? Have you heard of that?
[stammers] I mean, that's an action movie.
We should get a bunch of people to go. Do you guys want to go see…
translation.ko: 다 같이 가자 너흰 안 볼래?

translation.en: Mike, hey. We were supposed to watch that.
[Jessica] Yeah. Movie night with Bella. [chuckles awkwardly]
You know, are you even old enough to see this movie?
translation.ko: 너 나이 제한 걸리는 거 아냐?

translation.en: I mean, you know, without, like, adult supervision?
Right, yeah. Well, she's buying my ticket for me.
Jessica bailed, and Angela got the stomach flu,
so Eric's taking care of her.
-[gun cocks in movie] -[man 1] Put your gun down.
[man 2] Put her gun down, or I'm gonna blow your frickin' head off.
[man 3] Both of you put both of your guns down,
or I'm gonna blow both of your frickin' heads off.
[man 1] All right, forget it. Let's do this!
Okay, I… I think I'm gonna throw up. [groans]
You should hold out for someone with a stronger stomach.
Someone who laughs at the gore that makes weaker men vomit.
translation.ko: 피 보고 토하지 않고 웃어넘기는 애로

translation.en: Yeah, I'll keep my eye open for that.
I feel bad, he probably has that flu that's… going around.
What, I can't hold your hand?
I just think it, you know, means something a little different to you, so…
Okay, well, tell me something. You like me, right?
And you think I'm sort of beautiful.
Well, I've got loads of time.
It's just 'cause I don't want you to go anywhere.
You know, I'm not like a car that you can fix up.
translation.ko: 난 차처럼 네가 고칠 수 있는 게 못 돼

translation.en: I'm never gonna run right, so I should be fair to you.
translation.ko: 제대로 작동 안 할 거란 건 말해주는 게 맞지 싶어

translation.en: I know what he did to you.
translation.ko: 난 걔가 너한테 무슨 짓을 한지 알아

translation.en: And Bella, I would never, ever do that.
I won't ever hurt you. I promise.
I'm… I was feeling sick before the movie, okay?
translation.ko: 영화 보기 전부터 속이 안 좋았거든

translation.en: Feeling sick? Maybe you need to go to the hospital.
translation.ko: 속이 안 좋아? 그럼 병원에 가든가

translation.en: You want me to put you in the hospital?
Jake. Jake, Jake, the movie's over. What are you doing?
translation.ko: 제이콥, 왜 갑자기 영화 흉내 내고 그래?

translation.en: Like, you feel like you have a fever. Are you okay?
[Bella on phone] Jake, your dad says you have mono?
He won't let me visit, but would you call me?
translation.ko: 아저씨가 오지 말라니까 전화 좀 줄래?

translation.en: Hey. It's me again, I just…
I'm sorry about what I said at the movie theater.
I just wanted to hear your voice, so no pressure.
translation.ko: 네 목소리를 듣고 싶었어 신경 쓰지 마

translation.en: [Charlie] Okay. We should be back around three.
Look, I don't have to go fishing today.
Yeah, you do. Go. What are you talking about?
Those bears won't get the drop on me, Bella.
I thought you were too sick to come outside.
Or pick up the phone when I call.
Did Sam get to you? Is that what's happening?
No, Sam's trying to help me. Don't blame him.
translation.ko: 샘은 날 돕고 있어 뭐라고 하지 마

translation.en: But if you want somebody to blame,
how about those filthy bloodsuckers you love?
-I don't know what you're talking about. -You know exactly what I'm talking about.
translation.ko: 무슨 소린지 모르겠어 무슨 소린진 잘 알 텐데!

translation.en: You've been lying to everyone. Charlie.
translation.ko: 넌 다 속여 왔어 찰리 아저씨도

translation.en: But you can't lie to me.
[stammering] Jake, I know that I've been…
It's… it's killing me. It kills me.
translation.ko: 그래서 내 맘도 아파 너무나 아파

translation.en: I just need… maybe, give me, like, some time or something--
translation.ko: 난 다만… 어쩌면… 시간을 좀 줘

translation.en: It's not you, it's me, right? Really?
translation.ko: '네가 아닌 나 때문이다' 뭐 그런 거야?

translation.en: I used to be. A good kid.
This doesn't even matter, all right?
-This is over. -You can't break up with me.
translation.ko: 우린 끝났는데 넌 나랑 못 헤어져

translation.en: I mean, you're my best friend.
I promised I wouldn't hurt you, Bella.
And this is me keeping that promise.
And don't come back. Or you're gonna get hurt.
translation.ko: 다신 오지 마, 안 그럼 다쳐

translation.en: Without Jake, I just… I can't stand it.
But I really feel like he never existed.
I will find the place where I can see him again.
translation.ko: 그를 다시 볼 수 있는 곳을 찾아야겠어

translation.en: I didn't expect to find you here.
translation.ko: 이런 데서 보게 될 줄 몰랐네

translation.en: I went to visit Cullens, but… their house is empty.
I'm surprised they left you behind.
I'll tell them that you stopped by.
But he's far away, isn't he?
I came as a… favor to Victoria.
She asked me to see if you were still under the protection of the Cullens.
translation.ko: 네가 아직도 컬렌가의 보호를 받나 확인해달래

translation.en: Victoria feels it's only fair to kill Edward's mate,
given he killed hers. An eye for an eye.
Edward would know who did it. And he'd come after you.
After all, how much could you mean to him
if he left you here unprotected?
Oh, Victoria won't be happy about my killing you.
But I can't help myself. You are so mouthwatering.
Please don't. I mean, you helped us.
Don't be afraid. I'm doing you a kindness.
[whispers] Victoria plans on killing you slowly.
-In the woods. They're not bears. -What do you mean, in the woods?
translation.ko: 숲에 있는 건 곰이 아니에요 숲이라니? 대체 거긴 왜 갔는데?

translation.en: Bell, what the hell were you doing out in the woods?
They're wolves. I mean, they're, like, huge wolves.
Are you sure about that, Bella?
Yeah, I just saw them. They were after… something.
Feel like going hunting? Get some of your guys together?
translation.ko: 사냥 가야지? 사람들 좀 모아 주겠나?

translation.en: Sure, yeah, I'll, I'll just, uh…
[Bella] By now, those wolves will be dead.
And Laurent would have told her I'm unprotected.
I should go to the station.
Dad, you should… you should go.
[Charlie] Can you just stay in the house?
Oh, you scared me. What the hell are you doing?
Have you ever had a secret you couldn't tell anyone?
translation.ko: 넌 말 못 할 비밀 같은 거 없었어?

translation.en: One that wasn't yours to share?
Well, that's what it's like for me.
You have no idea how tight I'm bound.
translation.ko: 넌 상상도 못 해 어떤 제약인지…

translation.en: I hate what they've done to you.
I mean, the killer part is you already know.
translation.ko: 답답한 부분은 너도 이미 안다는 거야

translation.en: Bella, do you remember when we walked on the beach at La Push?
translation.ko: 벨라, 라푸시 해변에서 산책하던 거 기억나?

translation.en: I guess I understand why that's the only part you remember.
-that you can do. -No. I'm in it for life.
Maybe we should just get out of here for awhile.
We'll just leave. Just you and me.
I would do it for you.
It's not something I can just run away from, Bella.
But I would run away with you.
I gotta go. They'll start wondering where I am.
It'd be so much easier if you knew.
translation.ko: 네가 알면 한결… 짐을 덜 거 같아

translation.en: Jake, what are you doing? Wait, Jake.
[Jacob] Really, it's just, like, an old story.
I'm not really supposed to say anything about it.
translation.ko: 난 그 얘기 하면 안 돼

translation.en: Did you know Quileutes are supposedly descended from wolves?
Look, I'm sorry, I really need to see him.
-He didn't want this. -What did we do?
translation.ko: 걘 원치 않았어요 하지만 우리는 원해 걔가 뭘 했어? 뭐라고 그래?

translation.en: What did he do, hmm? What'd he tell you?
translation.ko: 하지만 우리는 원해 걔가 뭘 했어? 뭐라고 그래?

translation.en: He tells me nothing because he's scared of you.
translation.ko: 당신이 두려워 아무 말 못 했어요

translation.en: Hey. Take Bella back to Emily's place.
Guess the wolf's out of the bag.
is it possible that everything is true?
The fairy tales and horror stories.
Is it possible that there isn't anything sane and normal at all?
translation.ko: 평범한 건 없다는 게 가능한 일일까?

translation.en: Hey, I think we should go back and see if Jacob's okay.
I hope Paul sinks some teeth in him. Serves him right.
No way, Jacob's a natural. You see him phase on the fly?
translation.ko: 행여나 제이콥이 어떤 앤데! 날면서 변신하잖아 폴이 못 건드린다에 5달러!

translation.en: [Jared] I got five says Paul doesn't touch him.
Come on in, Bella. We won't bite.
Oh, hey, about Emily, Sam's fiancée. Don't stare. It bugs Sam.
translation.ko: 샘 약혼녀, 에밀리 말인데 쳐다보면 샘이 싫어해

translation.en: [Emily] You guys hungry? Like I have to ask.
Hmm, so… You're the vampire girl.
Guess so. Well, I'm engaged to one.
Save some for your brothers. And ladies first. Muffin?
translation.ko: 애들 좀 남겨 주고 숙녀 먼저야, 머핀?

translation.en: Leave it to Jacob to find a way around Sam's gag order.
translation.ko: 비밀 누설 금지령도 제이콥은 못 당하네

translation.en: Um, he didn't say anything to me.
Alpha's orders get obeyed whether we want 'em to or not.
Oh, and check it out. We can hear each other's thoughts.
translation.ko: 또 있어 우린 서로의 생각이 들려

translation.en: Would you shut up? These are trade secrets.
Damn it! This chick runs with vampires.
translation.ko: 닥칠래? 업무상 기밀인데, 젠장! 쟤 뱀파이어랑 어울린라고

translation.en: You can't really run with vampires.
You're not the first monsters I've met.
Jake's right. You're good with weird.
A few lucky members of the tribe have the gene.
translation.ko: 퀼렛족 중 운 좋은 몇 명만 그 유전자를 지녔어

translation.en: If a bloodsucker moves into town, then the fever sets in.
Well, can't you find a way to just…
It's not a lifestyle choice, Bella.
I was born this way, I can't help it.
You're such a hypocrite. What, I'm not the right kind of monster for you?
translation.ko: 너 진짜 이중적이다 난 너한테 맞는 괴물이 아냐?

translation.en: It's what you do. They never hurt anybody.
translation.ko: 행동이 문제지 그들은 사람 안 해쳐
너흰 사람을 죽였고 벨라, 우린 아무도 안 죽여

translation.en: What we're trying to protect you people from.
The only thing we do kill.
Don't worry, we can't touch your little precious Cullens
translation.ko: 걱정 마 너의 그 소중한 컬렌 일가는

translation.en: I… It's not what I'm saying. [stutters]
Really? We took out that leech with the dreads easy enough.
translation.ko: 그래? 머리 땋은 놈은 제거하기 쉽던데

translation.en: And his red-headed girlfriend is next.
Was. We chased her all the way to the Canadian border the other night.
She keeps coming back. We don't know what she's after.
translation.ko: 근데 자꾸 와 뭘 쫓는지 모르겠어

translation.en: Don't worry. We've got this place covered.
She won't get near you or Charlie.
translation.ko: 너나 아저씨 근처엔 얼씬도 못 할 거야

translation.en: She's fast. You don't know how fast she is.
You know, your lack of confidence in us is a little insulting.
And lately, that's all the time.
[Bella] But I realize where I have to go.
What I have to do to see him again.
translation.ko: 어디로 가야 할지 뭘 해야 할지 알겠어

translation.en: You wanted me to be human.
You won't stay with me any other way.
Bella. Bella, can you hear me?
[Jacob] What the hell were you thinking?
I just wanted to see something.
Get her home! I'm gonna go help out over at Harry's place.
translation.ko: 집으로 데려가! 난 해리 아저씨 댁에 가 볼게

translation.en: Harry Clearwater had a heart attack.
Charlie and my dad are over at his place with his family.
translation.ko: 너희 아빠, 우리 아빠 다 가셨어

translation.en: Come on. I'll get you something dry and drive you home.
translation.ko: 너 입을 거 좀 챙겨서 데려다줄게

translation.en: Hundred and eight degrees over here.
It must be nice never getting cold.
It's not. It's a Jacob thing.
[Jacob] Is this better? Now that you know about me.
translation.ko: 잘됐어 네가 나에 대해 알게 돼서

translation.en: You saw what happened to Emily.
Lost it for a split second…
He'll never be able to take that back.
What if I got mad at you?
I feel like I'm gonna disappear.
Okay, not that you need me to tell you something like this.
translation.ko: 이런 말 굳이… 할 필요도 없지만

translation.en: But I always will. You're not gonna lose yourself.
translation.ko: 계속 해 줄게 넌 절대 그렇게 안 돼

translation.en: I'll tell you all the time…
I can smell it. I'm getting you out of here.
Look, if a Cullen is back here, this is their territory.
translation.ko: 컬렌이 온 거라면 여긴 그들 영역이야

translation.en: Treaty says we can only defend on our own lands.
translation.ko: 조약상 우리 땅에서밖에 널 못 지킨다고

translation.en: -I can't protect you here. -Okay, it's okay.
translation.ko: 조약상 우리 땅에서밖에 널 못 지킨다고 괜찮아, 지킬 필요 없으니까

translation.en: You're about to cross a line.

translation.ko: 선 같은 거 긋지 마 제발

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -[Alice] Bella. What are you… [gasps]
I'm sorry, I just-- I can't believe you're here.
translation.ko: 미안, 너 온 게 안 믿어져서

translation.en: Would you like to explain to me how you're alive?
translation.ko: 어떻게 살아있나 설명 좀 해 줄래?

translation.en: I saw a vision of you. You jumped off a cliff.
Why in the hell would you try and kill yourself?
-I mean, what about Charlie? What about-- -I didn't try to kill myself.
translation.ko: 아저씨는 어쩌고? - 또… - 자살 시도한 적 없어
절벽 다이빙 한 거지 그냥 재미로

translation.en: I have never met anyone more prone to life-threatening idiocy.
translation.ko: 이렇게 자기 목숨 간수 못 하는 바보 처음 봐

translation.en: Did you… did you tell him?
He only calls in once every few months.
translation.ko: 겨우 몇 달에 한 번 연락하는걸

translation.en: He said he wants to be alone.
Bella, what is that god-awful wet dog smell?
translation.ko: 이 지독한 젖은 개 냄새는 또 뭐야?

translation.en: Bella! Werewolves are not good company to keep.
translation.ko: 벨라, 늑대 인간하고 어울리면 안 돼

translation.en: I had to see you were safe.
I thought you couldn't protect me here.
[Alice] Well, I'm not going to hurt her.
No, you're just a harmless Cullen.
I'm talking about the other bloodsucker who tried to kill Bella because of you.
translation.ko: 너희 때문에 벨라 죽이려 드는 흡혈귀 얘기야

translation.en: I didn't see you get pulled out of the water either.
translation.ko: 널 물에서 건져내는 것도 안 보였어

translation.en: I can't see past you and your pack of mutts.
translation.ko: 너희 개떼들 주위엔 장막이 쳐 있어
나 화나게 하지 마 - 그러지 마 - 엄청 험악해질 테니까

translation.en: -Or things are gonna get very ugly. -Stop, stop. Stop, stop.
You're not going anywhere, you're gonna come back, right?
translation.ko: 어디 가지 말고 돌아와야 해 - 알았지? - 저 개 내보내면

translation.en: As soon as you put the dog out.
Are there others? How many Cullens are here, and how long are they staying?
translation.ko: 다들 왔대? 몇 명이고 얼마나 있겠대?

translation.en: And she can stay as long as she'd like.
Well, if that's all, then you'd better go run back to Sam.
We don't have to do this to each other.
Bella, it's Edward. He thinks you're dead.
[Alice] Rosalie told him why I came here.
translation.ko: 내가 여기 온 이유를 로잘리한테 들었나 봐

translation.en: Why would you… Why didn't you let me speak to him?
-He didn't ask for you. -I don't care!
translation.ko: - 너 안 찾았어 - 벨라 - 그래도! - 걔는 볼투리가로 갈 거야

translation.en: Bella, he's going to the Volturi.
[Jacob] He left you, Bella. He didn't want you anymore, remember?
No, I'm not gonna let him kill himself out of guilt.
translation.ko: 죄책감 때문에 죽게 둘 순 없어

translation.en: I'm 18. I'm legally free to go and I left a note.
So you've made up your minds.
[clicks tongue] But if you're unhappy with your lot,
We would be delighted to utilize your skills.
Won't you consider staying with us?
You know it will happen anyway.
I'm guessing you didn't rent this car?
I figured you wouldn't be opposed to grand theft auto.
translation.ko: 차 훔친 거로 뭐라고 할 거야?

translation.en: He's gonna make a scene. Show himself to the humans.
translation.ko: - 그래서? - 사고 치려고 해 - 정체를 드러내려고 - 안 돼! 언제?

translation.en: [Alice] He's gonna wait until noon, when the sun's at its highest.
translation.ko: 햇빛이 가장 강한 정오까지 기다릴 거야

translation.en: -Why are they all in red? -San Marco's Day festival.
They're commemorating the expulsion of vampires from the city.
The Volturi will never let him get far enough to reveal himself.
you're the only one he can't see coming.
If I go, he'll read my thoughts. He'll think I'm lying.
translation.ko: 내가 가 봤자 안 믿고 오히려 서두를 거야

translation.en: -He'll rush into it. -Where do I go?
translation.ko: 내가 가 봤자 안 믿고 오히려 서두를 거야 - 어디로 가? - 시계탑 아래, 서둘러!

translation.en: [Alice] He'll be under the clock tower. Go!
Open your eyes, look at me. I'm alive.
translation.ko: 눈 뜨고 날 봐, 나 살아있어

translation.en: I needed to make you see me once.
You had to know I was alive, you didn't have to feel guilty about anything.
I can let you go now.
I never acted out of guilt.
I just couldn't live in a world where you don't exist.
translation.ko: 너 없는 세상은 살 수 없었을 뿐이니까

translation.en: [Edward] I lied. I had to lie.
translation.ko: - 그렇지만 내게… - 거짓말이었어 어쩔 수 없었는데 너무 쉽게 믿더라

translation.en: But you believed me so easily.
translation.ko: 어쩔 수 없었는데 너무 쉽게 믿더라

translation.en: Because it doesn't make sense for you to love me.
translation.ko: 네가 날 사랑한다는 건 말이 안 됐으니까
난 한낱 인간일 뿐 아무것도 아닌걸

translation.en: I won't be needing your services after all, gentlemen.
Aro wants to speak with you again.
Nonetheless, we should take this conversation to a more appropriate venue.
translation.ko: 일단 적당한 곳에 가서 얘길 나누시죠

translation.en: Bella, why don't you go enjoy the rest of the festival.
- The girl comes with us. - No, you can go to hell.
translation.ko: 여자도 함께 갑니다 아뇨, 당치 않아요

translation.en: It's a festival. You wouldn't want to make a scene.
translation.ko: 축제 날 소란 피워 좋을 거 없는데

translation.en: Aro sent me to see what was taking so long.
translation.ko: 왜 이리 늦냐고 아로 님이 보내셨다

translation.en: [Alec] Sister. Send you out to get one and you bring back two.
-Such a clever girl. -What a happy surprise!
[Aro] Her blood appeals to you so much.
How can you stand to be so close to her?
translation.ko: 어떻게 그리 가까이 있을 수 있지?

translation.en: Aro can read every thought I've ever had with one touch.
translation.ko: 아로 님은 한 번 만지면 지난 생각을 다 읽으셔

translation.en: You are quite a soul reader yourself, Edward.
Though… you can't read Bella's thoughts.
I would love to see if…
you are an exception to my gifts, as well.
Would you do me the honor?
Let us see if she is immune to all our powers.
Just stop hurting him, please! Please!
This may hurt just a little.
So, what do we do with you now?
You already know what you're going to do, Aro.
Kill me, kill me. Not him.
You would give up your life…
You don't know a thing… about his soul.
translation.ko: 당신은 그의 영혼에 대해 아무것도 몰라요

translation.en: If only it were your intention to give her immortality.
translation.ko: 이 애를 뱀파이어로 만들 수 있으면 좋으련만

translation.en: Bella will be one of us.
Mesmerizing, to see what you have seen…
translation.ko: 매혹적이로다 미처 일어나기도 전에 앞일을 내다보다니

translation.en: Your gifts will make for an intriguing immortal.
translation.ko: 네 재능을 통해 넌 흥미로운 뱀파이어가 될 거다

translation.en: Let us be done with this.
I would advise that you follow through on your promise soon.
[Caius] We do not offer second chances.
Yes, they do look rather juicy.
I'll still be here when you wake up.
[Edward] Bella. The only reason I left…
was because I thought I was protecting you.
I needed you to have a chance
translation.ko: 나 없이 평범하고 행복하게 살 기회를 주려고

translation.en: It was so easy for you to leave.
Leaving you was the hardest thing I've done in 100 years.
Dad, you don't have to worry.
The last time you said that you took off.
I didn't see you for three days.
Bella… do not ever do that to me again.
for the rest of your life.
We're not technically breaking any of his rules.
translation.ko: 엄밀히 따지자면 규칙 깨는 건 아냐

translation.en: He did say I couldn't take a step inside the door.
translation.ko: 이 집 문턱에 발 들이지 말라셔서

translation.en: I came in through the window.
He's not gonna forgive me easily.
I hope you can, 'cause I honestly don't know
translation.ko: 용서해 줘, 왜냐면… 나 너 없인 살 수 없으니까
나 너 없인 살 수 없으니까

translation.en: you can't get rid of me.
She won't need to change you.
There are always ways to keep the Volturi in the dark.
You all know what I want.
And I know how much I'm asking for.
The only thing that I can think of for it to be fair is to just vote.
translation.ko: 투표로 정하는 게 공평할 거 같아요

translation.en: You don't know what you're talking about. Shut up.
I already consider you my sister.
It would be nice to not want to kill you all the time.
translation.ko: 늘 죽이고 싶은 마음이 없어진다면 좋을 거야

translation.en: I'm really sorry to both of you how I've acted.
translation.ko: 그동안 못되게 군 거 둘한테 미안해

translation.en: And I'm really grateful that you were brave enough to go and save my brother.
translation.ko: 내 동생 구해준 네 용기도 참 고맙고

translation.en: But this isn't a life I would have chosen for myself.
translation.ko: 하지만 이건 내가 원했던 삶이 아냐

translation.en: And I wish that there had been someone to vote no for me.
translation.ko: 누군가 날 위해 반대표를 던져 줬길 바라지

translation.en: And we can pick a fight with these Volturi some other way.
I already consider you a part of the family.
Why are you doing this to me?
You've chosen not to live without her, which leaves me no choice.
translation.ko: 네가 벨라 없인 못 살겠다니 딴 도리가 없구나

translation.en: [Bella] I'll wait until after graduation to make it easier on Charlie.
translation.ko: 졸업 때까지 기다릴게 아빠 덜 힘들게

translation.en: Edward, I want you to be the one to do it.
He wants to talk to me.
[Jacob] So you're still alive for now.
[Edward] He thinks it's me keeping you away.
translation.ko: 제이콥은 나 때문에 네가 멀리한 줄 알아

translation.en: [Jacob] You stay the hell out of my head.
[Edward] Jacob… I know you have something to say to me.
translation.ko: 제이콥 할 말이 있는 건 아는데

translation.en: But I want to say something to you first, if that's all right.
Thank you for keeping Bella alive when… I didn't.
translation.ko: 내가 하지 못 했을 때 벨라를 지켜줘서 고마워

translation.en: And it wasn't for your benefit, trust me.
But I'm here now, and I'm not going to leave her side until she orders me away.
translation.ko: 하지만 이젠 벨라가 원하는 한 곁에 있을 거야

translation.en: I'm here to remind you about a key point in the treaty.
If any of them bites a human, the truce is over.
translation.ko: 그들 중 누구라도 인간을 물면 휴전은 끝이야

translation.en: What if I choose it? It has nothing to do with you.
No. No, I won't let you.
You're not gonna be one of them, Bella.
You know what we'll do to you. I won't have a choice.
translation.ko: 우리가 너한테 할 짓 알잖아 나도 어쩔 수 없어

translation.en: Is he gonna hurt me? Read his mind.
translation.ko: 제이콥이 날 해칠까? 읽어 봐 줘

translation.en: No, you don't speak for her.
You can't hurt each other without hurting me.
You shouldn't become what I am.
If you want me to do it myself.
